fields.headline: Lewis in wonderland
fields.bodyText: Lewis Hamilton reached a milestone in his career yesterday when he accelerated out on to the circuit at Silverstone for his first serious formula one test at the wheel of one of the latest McLaren-Mercedes MP4-21s. The test was the latest step in the team's process of assessing whether or not the 21-year-old British driver, who clinched the GP2 title at Monza 10 days ago, should be promoted to their formula one line-up in 2007 alongside Fernando Alonso, who is moving to McLaren from Renault.
